page.title: 01SUMMARY OF ST.HELENS AREA
page.content: Our block covers an area of St. Helens that is on the outskirts of the town. A major coverage of the land is farmland, with 8 squares of our block having farming as the Primary Land cover. One district of our block is called{Clock Face. }In Clock Face there are many houses. Many years ago Clock Face was mainly fields and farms but now houses have been built. At one time the railway used to run a passenger service from St. Helens to Widnes but now it is used by coal trains from Sutton Manor Colliery. St. Helens is an industrial town but in our block there is only half of one square that has industries in it. The main industry in our block was mining but the Clock Face Colliery is now closed. {Sutton}is another district in our block.
